original_title: Sri Lanka’s Vidullanka commissions 3MWp solar project in Matara
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka energy company Vidullanka PLC has commissioned a 3MWp solar power plant in Kamburupitiya, Matara, a stock exchange filing said.
The project was implemented through MataraSolar Power (Pvt) Limited, a fully owned subsidiary of Vidullanka.
The plant is expected to generate 5.5 GWh of clean energy, the filing said. (Colombo/Sep19/2025)
